comments:
I upgraded Eclipse and found that it was not working after the upgrade. 

So i decided to do the quick fix and installed a clean 3.0 version i had still
on my hard disk - eclipse-SDK-3.0-win32.zip.
I started up, everything worked fine, then i upgraded to 3.0.2 from within the
application. The upgrade installed, eclipse restarted and produced this error
message:
"An error has occurred. See log file..."

I thought this worthy of filing because it should be reproducable anywhere. I
took a clean, unchanged 3.0 install and upgraded, following the recommended
steps. I chose all the default values in all dialogs.

Log file as follows:

this bug has been fixed in 3.0.2.
To recover, download the sdk zip, unzip it on top, and restart eclipse with -
clean.

traces.message: No application id has been found.
